summary:
Skyrim Save Helper main features:

  Character manager
  Auto-save
  Archives
  Backup
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Save Helper 1.1.1
------------------------

Features
---------

Character manager

	Choose a character and start the game, only selected
	character saves will be listed in game save/load menu.

	All other characters saves will be moved to a subdirectory
	\"characters\" in your main save directory

Auto-save
	
	Create save from quick saves

		Each new quicksave will be copied as a normal
		save in your save directory

		You no longer need to use the save menu

	Rename auto saves

		Rename autosaves in normal save format.
		So they won\'t be deleted.

Archives
	
	Delete old saves (move to trash)

	Compress old saves (gzip)

	Move old saves to specified directory

Backup

	When a new save file is detected
	
		Copy it to specified directory

		Send to FTP


Changelog
---------

1.1.1

	As suggested by	allas, I added race and level in character manager
	More files check to prevent error with slow process such ftp backup


1.1.0

	FTP backup feature is now available
	Game running detection fix, now checking for TESV.exe and TESV.exe.4gb. If there is other mods that change the main exe, just let me know, I\'ll add these in this helper.
	Modified UI, log window is now a part of the main window
	New feature: play a sound if an error occurs
	minor bug fixes

1.0.6
	
	Fix characters/<name> directories with special chars in name

1.0.5
	
	Small bug fix

1.0.4
	
	Game running detection fix

1.0.3
	
	Characters manager bug fix

1.0.1
	
	Bug fix with Auto-saves

1.0
	
	First release


Contact
-------

Skyrim Save Helper, by Woutre (sebeuu@gmail.com)

Feel free to report any bug, idea, ...
author: Woutre
